skills.title: ReactJS
skills.description: If you need an interactive web application i can help you build one using ReactJS.

skills.title: NodeJS
skills.description: Or maybe it's a backend what you need. Then i can build an API with NodeJS and ExpressJS.

skills.title: MongoDB
skills.description: If you have a backend with NodeJS you may need to save your data using the MongoDB non-relational database.

skills.title: C#
skills.description: Maybe you have a project in mind where you need to use the famous .NET framework. Then i can build something for you using C#.

skills.title: Microsoft SQL Server
skills.description: Perhaps you are more of a relational database person. Then I could help you with your data using Microsoft SQL Server.
